message: Let's make a deal! This offer gives you a decent share and saves us both from inflation.
My turn! Let's split the difference a bit more this time.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a fair offer, and it's better to secure something now than risk getting nothing later.
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer is fair and time is running out.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm holding firm, but every round is costing you. Take the deal!
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
Bob, you're running out of time.  That 'final offer' was laughable. This is my final offer - take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
